answerText: vitamin A[10] All-trans retinoic acid can trigger the expression of these important transcription factors, which contain a conserved 60 amino acid domain and are responsible for laying down the body plan of an organism.
heading: Penn Bowl |2012 | 8 | 12 | Science | Biology | College
subject: Science
question: Question: Rhodopsin's cofactor is derived from this molecule, another derivative of which is used to treat acute promyelocytic leukemia if the 15-to-17 translocation is present. For 10 points each: [10] Identify this vitamin, which is the precursor of retinol and retinoic acid. This vitamin is important for vision and is the prototype of the carotenoids.
